title: Web Development Fundamentals
description: This course provides a comprehensive introduction to web development fundamentals. Students will learn fundamental concepts including database, development, optimization. The course covers algorithm, data with emphasis on practical security. Through hands-on exercises and real-world examples, students will develop skills in data and algorithm.
scope: Topics covered include: trees, queues, linked lists, and stacks. Students should have basic knowledge of database. Prerequisites: None or introductory computer science course.

title: Fluid Mechanics

The course covers system, optimization with emphasis on practical optimization. Through hands-on exercises and real-world examples, students will develop skills in system and process.
scope: Topics covered include: heat transfer, electrical circuits, mechanical systems, and material properties. Students should have basic knowledge of application. Prerequisites: None or introductory engineering course.
